select ci.id, ci.user_id, ci.order_code, ci.create_date, ci.merchant_id, ci.content, ci.status, ui.name as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages, oi.start_address, oi.end_address, mi.name as merchantName, mi.principal, mi.phone as merchantPhone, mi.address from complaint_info ci left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ci.user_id) left join order_info oi on (oi.code = ci.order_code) left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = ci.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{complaintInfo.userName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{complaintInfo.merchantName},'%')
AND ci.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{complaintInfo.orderCode},'%')
AND mi.user_id = #{complaintInfo.merchantId}
order by ci.create_date desc
